en.about_obj_1: Develop a website presenting knowledge about human body structures
en.about_obj_2: Promote Anatomy learning in an easy-to-understand and interesting way
en.about_obj_3: Allow users to explore various body systems sequentially
en.about_obj_4: Practice web design and development skills using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
